rules.description: Windows + Shift + S key to panel capture (command+shift+5)
Rebind Command + Shift + 5 to Control + Shift + S.
Command+Backspace/Delete => Option+(Fn)+Delete (Remove a whole word ahead or behind)
Command + Shift + v does special paste without formatting, equivalent to. cmd+opt+shift+v.
Control+Backspace/Delete => Option+(Fn)+Delete (Remove a whole word ahead or behind)
Command + Shift + v does special paste without formatting, equivalent to. cmd+opt+shift+v.
